thread.title: Whimsical Storybook Illustrations by Antanas Gudonis
thread.title_full: Whimsical Storybook Illustrations by Antanas Gudonis

author: Christopher Jobson
title: Whimsical Storybook Illustrations by Antanas Gudonis
text:
Illustration Whimsical Storybook Illustrations by Antanas Gudonis by Christopher Jobson on January 30, 2017 
Antanas Gudonis is a Helsinki-based illustrator who created this wonderful series of images as part of a personal project centered on a handful of rotund egg-like creatures and their adventures. You can see more of his digital illustration work on Behance . (via Lustik ) See related posts on Colossal about digital , surreal . Also on Colossal...
